categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository recently, focusing on various improvements and fixes:

- PR #3883 by wtfsayo addresses issues with chat bubbles in the interface
- PR #3888 by wtfsayo fixes migration-related problems in the v2 version
- PR #3894 by mindxploit adds permanent knowledge capability to the system, enhancing its memory features
- PR #3891 by wtfsayo implements a clean command for the v2 version
- PR #3893 by wtfsayo resolves issues with the GUI build and API server
- PR #3887 by HashWarlock updates Docker files to ensure proper containerization

Several bug fixes and improvements have been made to the ElizaOS project recently:

**Bug Fixes:**
- Fixed chat bubbles (PR #3883)
- Fixed GUI build and API server (PR #3893)
- Fixed migrations (PR #3888)

**Features and Refactoring:**
- Added clean command to core and reverted minor changes (PR #3892)
- Refactored the clean command to V2 (PR #3891)

**Other Changes:**
- Modified migration handling to skip migrations if they already exist, assuming only one migration is kept (PR #3889)

categories.title: Recent Issues in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub Repository

content.text:
Several issues have been recently reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Issue #3886: A problem with the conversion of JSON null values, reported by user aiden-cao.

2. Issue #3885: Creation of a Chinese AI Agent community discussion group, posted by aiqubits.

3. Issue #3896: Functionality problems with the client app where microphone and audio playback features are not working, reported by JulioMCruz.

4. Issue #3897: A formatting issue where line breaks should be converted to spaces, reported by jmikedupont2.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed increased activity from March 10-12, 2025. On March 10-11, there was 1 new PR (which was merged), 2 new issues, and 5 active contributors. Activity increased significantly the following day (March 11-12) with 9 new PRs (5 of which were merged), 2 new issues, and 7 active contributors.
sources: From 2025-03-10 to 2025-03-11, elizaos/eliza had 1 new PRs (1 merged), 2 new issues, and 5 active contributors.
From 2025-03-11 to 2025-03-12, elizaos/eliza had 9 new PRs (5 merged), 2 new issues, and 7 active contributors.
